title: 03/12 Fantasy Football Podcast: Let's Go Browns!
description:
We spend the first half of the show talking about the Browns and bringing in Cleveland Browns Senior Media Broadcaster (and former colleague) Nathan Zegura! Which CLE WR will put up the best numbers? What happens to Duke Johnson and David Njoku and what do we expect from the Browns with the #1 overall pick in the NFL Draft? ... Heath also has plenty of takes on these CLE trades (25:30), plus we discuss Doug Baldwin's potential (32:55), how good Jimmy Graham could be on NO (38:55) and Cameron Brate's new contract (40:56) ... Revisiting the Aizer/Friendship Strategy (51:35). Did it work? ... Your emails at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
